name: BlueprintConverter
title: Blueprint Converter
author: AdeptX8
description:
Allows you to transfer a blueprint into a request object (requester chest, buffer chest, spidertron or character request slots).

Shortcuts:
1. CTRL+SHIFT+V - Transferring the blueprint to the request object.
2. CTRL+SHIFT+S - Saving the request object to manipulate it (mouse on the request object).
3. CTRL+SHIFT+D - Disposable requester chest.
4. CTRL+SHIFT+B - Backup character request slots.
5. CTRL+SHIFT+R - Restore character request slots.
6. CTRL+SHIFT+M - Switches the request merging mode.

[More details on the site!]
